simpleFormLocal.title: Simple form local

simpleFormGlobal.title: Simple form global
simpleFormGlobal.description: Simple form with values in global state.

initialValuesAdvanced.title: Initial values advanced
initialValuesAdvanced.description: An advanced example that implements the following features: {br} initial values, {br}reset to initial values, {br} clear form.

setValuesAdvanced.title: Set values advanced
setValuesAdvanced.description: An advanced example that implements the following features: {br}loading a user, {br}changing a user, {br}saving a user, {br}checking that the user was changed, {br}canceling changes (resetting)

mixValidation.title: Mix validation
mixValidation.description: A mix of field-level and form-level validations.

setErrorLocal.description: Set field error local state level.

setErrorGlobal.title: Set error global
setErrorGlobal.description: Set field error global state state.
